channel.title: Food Rescue Philippines on Pantrypoints
channel.description: Recent content in Food Rescue Philippines on Pantrypoints

item.title: New Partners: Food Rescue Philippines and Savilas Vietnam
item.description: We welcome more partners implementing our moneyless points system: Food Rescue Philippines Food Rescue Philippines is a volunteer group that uses food waste to end malnutrition and involuntary hunger in the Philippines. Savilas Vietnam Savilas is a small seafood company that sources its supplies from sustainable fisheries in Vietnam. We got in touch with them while we were adapting the Pantrypoints system for the Fishackathon challenge earlier this year.
